    Make gene track plot

    finemapping_annot_trackplot.Rd

    Make gene track plot

    finemapping_annot_trackplot(
  finemapstats,
  region,
  gene.annots,
  bigSNP,
  txdb,
  genome = c("hg19", "hg38"),
  genetrack_db = c("txdb", "gene.annots", "UCSC"),
  filter_protein_coding_genes = TRUE,
  countsdata,
  peaks,
  HiC_loops,
  filter_HiCloops_genes = NULL,
  filter_HiCloops_snps = NULL,
  data_colors = seq_along(countsdata),
  data_ylim = c(0, 1),
  color_pip_by = c("locus", "cs", "none"),
  highlight_snps = NULL,
  highlight_colors = "pink",
  genelabel_side = c("above", "right", "left", "below"),
  track.sizes = NULL,
  rotation.title = 90,
  verbose = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    finemapstats

    A GRanges object or data frame of finemapping summary statistics

    region

    A GRanges object or data frame for the genomic range to plot

    gene.annots

    A GRanges object of gene annotations

    bigSNP

    A bigsnpr object attached via bigsnpr::snp_attach()

    txdb

    A txdb object of gene annotations

    genome

    Genome assembly version, hg19 (default) or hg38.

    genetrack_db

    Select a gene annotation database to use. Options: txdb: use the txdb objec. gene.annots: use the gene.annots object. UCSC uses UCSC knownGene annotations.

    filter_protein_coding_genes

    If TRUE, only shows protein coding gene

    countsdata

    A list of counts data

    peaks

    A list of peaks

    HiC_loops

    A list of HiC loops, e.g. PC-HiC, ABC, etc.

    filter_HiCloops_genes

    If TRUE, only shows HiC loops connected to the gene(s)

    filter_HiCloops_snps

    If TRUE, only shows HiC loops connected to the SNP(s)

    data_colors

    Colors for the countsdata tracks

    data_ylim

    ylim range for the countsdata tracks

    color_pip_by

    color SNPs in the PIP track by locus, cs, or none (same color).

    highlight_snps

    SNPs (rsIDs) to highlight

    highlight_colors

    Colors for the highlighted SNPs

    genelabel_side

    Side to put gene labels, options are: above (default), right, left, below

    track.sizes

    Sizes of the tracks

    rotation.title

    Rotation of the track titles

    verbose

    if TRUE, print detail messages for plotting

    Contents

    Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Alan Selewa, Sebastian Pott, Xin He.
